definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be thick, fat, gross (NH Pi. [[עִבָּה]] make thick, and deriv.; Syr. 9bo0 swell up, pt. pass. swollen, thick, dense, stupid, and many deriv.; Ar. gabiya be dense, stupid, 0’agbay dense foliage; Eth. 9abya: be great Di:985);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[מִמָּתְנֵי אָבִי]] ´[[קָֽטֳנִּי ע]] 1Ki 12:10 my little finger is thicker (stouter) than, etc., = 2Ch 10:10; be thick, gross, of rebell. Isr. under fig. of highly fed beast, 2 ms. [[שָׁמַנְתָּ עָבִיתָ כָּשִׂיתָ]] De 32:15.
